en-US.Amount_max: Ha ha. You want to partially close more than you totally have. Need a personal loan to tide you over ?
en-US.Terms_Conditions: You will need to accept the Terms & Conditions before your deposit is closed.
en-US.Success_Message: Your deposit has been closed successfully
en-US.Close_Deposit_Note1: Once you click submit, your Deposit will be closed and credited in your linked account.
en-US.Close_Deposit_Note2: You will earn interest applicable to the corresponding period that the deposit has been active.
en-US.Amount_Mandatory: You need to decide how much of this Fixed Deposit you want to close early. Please enter an amount for this.
